column4: Hey guys, I've tried everything on this distro and I cannot get my wireless card even recognised...
plug it in, then type dmesg | tail in a terminal
its not turning up in that dmsg.
lspci: 01:05.0 Network controller: Broadcom Corporation BCM4318 [AirForce One 54g]  802.11g Wireless LAN Controller (rev 02)
